title: My husband’s secret children
itunes:title: My husband’s secret children
description:
My husband never wanted me on Facebook but I made an account anyway to keep in touch with family and friends. We've been married for 2 years and I loved and admired him until recently. Fast forward to one of the worst days of my life…

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
